title: ATypI keynote and other events open to non conference attendees
content:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE   
August 27, 2003   
  
ATypI opens registration for some events to the public   
ATypI Conference 2003 - Vancouver, Canada   
September 25-28, 2003   
   
Association Typographique Internationale announced today that some events taking place at their Vancouver 2003 Conference will be available for the public to register to attend. In particular, the pre-conference events as well as the keynote address and the Gala Dinner are available to those who are not able to attend the entire conference.   
   
The conference, with the theme
author: John Hudson
